name: Hunter Macias

projects.title: Minecraft Recreation
projects.modalDescription: Minecraft is a voxel-based game. And what this truly implies is that every single block in Minecraft is a voxel. Using the Ursina engine we will be able to render these voxels. Disclaimer: This solution is not scalable for creating a big world. It is intended for educational purposes only. (MACOS - not supported)

projects.title: Pac-Man Recreation
projects.modalDescription: A PyGame Implementation of the Classic Arcade game Pac-Mac. This project is part of a series of Classic Arcade Games implemented in PyGame. The Essencials: to make Pac-Man eat all available pellets, while avoiding collisions with ghosts chasing him. Ghosts: Ghosts always start at their home base. All ghosts move toward random direction. Game Levels: All levels will be generated based on the map data from the resource files.  Collection Num: 1

projects.title: Spave Invaders Recreation
projects.modalDescription: A PyGame Implementation of the popular Classic Atari and NES Arcade games. This project is part of a series of Classic Arcade Games implemented in Pygames. Collection Num: 2

projects.title: Snake Game + A.I
projects.modalDescription: A PyGame Implementation of the popular Classic Retro Snake Game with AI. This project is part of a series of ML with PyGame Series. Collection Num: 3

projects.title: WEB3.0 Crypto Lottery App
projects.modalDescription: Lottery Draw App built using Next.js/TailwindCSS and Solidity Smart Contract with thirdweb's new deploy. Metamask wallet required to login.

services.title: Game Development üëæ
services.description: Stranded at home with lots of time on your hands? Want to learn something new and exciting? If you‚Äòre like most developers, you‚Äôve probably been kicking around a game design in your head. Now is the time to give it a try, improve your skills, and have some fun. This tutorial will teach you a few game development concepts using PyGame, which is a cross-platform set of Python modules designed for writing video games.

services.title: Programming Fundamentals üñ•Ô∏è
services.description: Learn to think programmatically (the quintessence of coding) to thrive in the digital age. Coding Fundamentals is our 6-week part-time introduction course on essential coding concepts. There are 12 sessions to discover, covering six technical concepts: variables, functions, conditionals, loops, arrays and hash tables, and version control. Well build apps, learn coding fundamentals, and understand software engineering ‚Äî all the building blocks that youll need to enter the tech space.

services.title: Machine Learning & Artificial Inteligence üöÄ
services.description: Machine learning and artificial intelligence is the new trend for kids who love learning and exploring technology. Parents may think that the concepts of machine learning may be too challenging for young children to learn. However, you may be surprised at how easy it is to pick-up. Sign up for a session and jumpstart your next journey in tech!

services.title: Research & Design ‚ú®
services.description: Learn how to research like a software developer and how to use popular industry design frameworks.

aboutpara: Hi! I'm Hunter. I offer a variety of unique and awesome coding services, tutorials, and products. I specialize in web development, but also offer services in mobile development, app development, and more! I created Panda Bit because I wanted to make it easy for people to learn how to code and get started in their tech careers. My tutorials are easy to follow and are designed for people of all skill levels. My goal is to help as many people as possible become successful in the tech industry! I want to help people of all ages and skill levels learn to code - it's an amazing skill that will open so many doors for them. And not only that, but coding is just plain fun! If you're looking for a reliable, friendly, and affordable tech resource, you've come to the right place.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a software engineer, product designer.

Developed and deployed React application, Developed web scraping program using Selenium, Tasked with scrapping data for over 100 different companies, Implemented login system using PHP
Designed and Implemented first-ever Python course, Lead Instructor for 3 different courses: python web-development and unity game development
